mapper.select: SELECT MBR_ID, UUID, ID, PSWD, MBR_NM, EML_ADDR, MBL_TELNO, FXNO, ZIP, ADDR, DADDR, LGN_LCK_YN, LGN_FAIL_NMTM, FRST_RGTR_ID, FRST_REG_DT, LAST_MDFR_ID, LAST_MDFCN_DT, STTS_CD, DVC_PUSH_TOKEN FROM VST_MBR WHERE ID = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE VST_MBR SET LGN_LCK_YN = 'N', LGN_FAIL_NMTM = 0 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT C.AUTHRT_CD FROM VST_MBR A LEFT JOIN VST_MBR_AUTHRT B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID LEFT JOIN VST_AUTHRT C ON B.AUTHRT_ID = C.AUTHRT_ID WHERE A.MBR_ID = #{mbrId}
SELECT MBR_NM, ID FROM VST_MBR WHERE MBR_NM = #{mbrNm} ANd EML_ADDR = #{emlAddr}
